================================================================================
INTERACT EMPLOYEE ENGAGEMENT PLATFORM - DOCUMENTATION INDEX
================================================================================

This index provides a curated overview of the project's documentation structure.
The complete, machine-readable documentation is available in llms-full.txt.

Last Updated: 2026-01-14
Platform: Base44 + React + TypeScript
Target: Remote-first employee engagement (50-5,000 employees)

================================================================================
QUICK START & OVERVIEW
================================================================================

README.md
  → Project overview, quick start guide, technology stack
  → Installation and development setup
  → Project structure and key features

DOCUMENTATION_SUMMARY.md
  → Central hub for all documentation
  → Quick reference guide
  → Documentation organization

CONTEXT.md
  → Project context and "why" behind decisions
  → Historical context and key decisions
  → Important context for developers and AI agents

GLOSSARY.md
  → Domain-specific terminology and definitions
  → Acronyms and technical terms
  → Consistent vocabulary across documentation

================================================================================
AI & INTELLIGENT FEATURES
================================================================================

ALGORITHMS.md
  → Core algorithms for gamification, recommendations, analytics
  → Scoring and ranking algorithms
  → Performance optimization strategies

AGENTS.md
  → AI agents used in the platform
  → Agent types, architecture, and integration
  → Activity planning, engagement coach, learning path agents

MCP-SERVER.md
  → Model Context Protocol server implementation
  → Resources, tools, and prompts for LLMs
  → Integration with Claude, IDEs, and custom tools

PROMPTS.md
  → Prompt engineering guidelines and templates
  → Content generation, user assistance, development prompts
  → Best practices and optimization techniques

AI-SAFETY.md
  → AI safety principles and controls
  → Bias prevention and incident response
  → Privacy protection in AI processing

================================================================================
ARCHITECTURE & TECHNICAL DESIGN
================================================================================

ADR/
  → Architecture Decision Records
  → 001: Use Base44 for Backend
  → 002: Choose React over Vue
  → 003: Use TailwindCSS
  → 004: Migrate to TypeScript
  → 005: Establish Testing Infrastructure

DATA-FLOW.md
  → How data flows through the platform
  → Authentication, activity creation, real-time updates
  → State management and caching strategies

STATE-MACHINE.md
  → State machines for complex workflows
  → Activity, challenge, and user engagement states
  → State transitions and diagrams

DEPENDENCIES.md
  → Complete dependency list and management
  → Security status and update policy
  → Deprecation notices

ERD.md
  → Entity Relationship Diagram
  → Core entities and relationships
  → Database indexes and constraints

SCHEMAS.md
  → Data schemas and validation rules
  → TypeScript interfaces and Zod schemas
  → API request/response schemas

================================================================================
DEVELOPMENT & OPERATIONS
================================================================================

DEVELOPMENT.md
  → Comprehensive developer guide
  → Setup, workflow, coding standards
  → Common tasks and debugging

CONTRIBUTING.md
  → How to contribute to the project
  → Code of conduct, workflow, and PR process
  → Testing requirements and documentation

TESTING.md
  → Testing strategy and infrastructure
  → Unit, integration, E2E testing
  → Coverage targets and best practices

CLI.md
  → Command-line interface reference
  → NPM scripts, Base44 CLI, Git commands
  → Utility scripts and database tools

ENV-VARS.md
  → Environment variables reference
  → Frontend, backend, and third-party service config
  → Security best practices

CI-CD.md
  → Continuous Integration/Deployment pipeline
  → GitHub Actions workflows
  → Deployment strategies and rollback

TOOLS.md
  → Development tools and utilities
  → Build tools, testing tools, custom hooks
  → AI tools and integration SDKs

SECURITY & COMPLIANCE
================================================================================

GOVERNANCE.md
  → Governance structure and decision-making
  → Product, technical, and security decisions
  → Compliance and risk management

DATA-PRIVACY.md
  → Data privacy principles and practices
  → GDPR compliance and user rights
  → Data classification and retention

THREAT-MODEL.md
  → Security threats and attack vectors
  → Authentication, authorization, data threats
  → Security controls and mitigations

AUDIT-LOGS.md
  → Audit logging practices
  → What we log, retention policy, access control
  → Compliance (GDPR, SOC 2)

docs/security/
  → SECURITY.md - Security architecture
  → INCIDENT_RESPONSE.md - Incident procedures
  → VULNERABILITY_DISCLOSURE.md - Disclosure policy
  → GDPR_CHECKLIST.md - GDPR compliance
  → DATA_MAPPING.md - Data flow documentation

PRODUCT & PLANNING
================================================================================

PRD.md
  → Product Requirements Document
  → Features, requirements, success metrics
  → User personas and technical architecture

FEATURE_ROADMAP.md
  → 18-month feature roadmap
  → 15 production-grade features
  → Priorities, timelines, and success criteria

ROADMAP.md
  → High-level product roadmap (Q1 2026 - Q2 2027)
  → Quarterly goals and key deliverables
  → Vision and success criteria

RELEASES.md
  → Release history and versioning
  → Release process and channels
  → Breaking changes and deprecation policy

SUPPORT.md
  → Support resources and channels
  → Bug reporting and feature requests
  → Service status and feedback

API & INTEGRATION
================================================================================

API-CONTRACTS.md
  → API endpoint specifications
  → Authentication and core endpoints
  → Request/response formats

API_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md
  → Practical guide for Base44 SDK integration
  → Entity operations, authentication, file uploads
  → Best practices and troubleshooting

AUTH.md
  → Authentication and authorization
  → JWT tokens, SSO, SAML
  → RBAC permission matrix

components/docs/API_REFERENCE.md
  → Complete API endpoint reference
  → Entity operations, integrations
  → Examples and usage

PERFORMANCE.md
  → Performance optimization strategies
  → Targets, monitoring, and tools
  → Frontend, backend, network optimization

  → Caching strategies (client and server)
  → TanStack Query, localStorage, Redis
  → Cache invalidation patterns

ERROR-CODES.md
  → HTTP status codes and application errors
  → Error response format
  → Authentication, validation, business logic errors

INFRASTRUCTURE.md
  → Infrastructure architecture
  → Hosting, deployment, environments
  → Scalability and capacity

OBSERVABILITY.md
  → Monitoring and observability (planned)
  → Logging, metrics, tracing

MIGRATION.md
  → Migration guides and upgrade paths
  → Breaking changes and compatibility

VECTOR-DB.md
  → Vector database integration (planned for AI features)

BACKUP-RECOVERY.md
  → Backup and disaster recovery procedures

================================================================================
TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE (components/docs/)
================================================================================

60+ technical documentation files including:
- ARCHITECTURE.md - Complete system architecture
- DATABASE_SCHEMA_TECHNICAL_SPEC.md - Database design
- FRAMEWORK.md - Technologies and design patterns
- COMPONENT_LIBRARY.md - UI component documentation
- FEATURE_SPECS.md - Detailed feature specifications
- ONBOARDING_SPEC.md - Employee onboarding system
- GAMIFICATION_ADMIN_GUIDE.md - Gamification configuration

================================================================================
USAGE NOTES
================================================================================

1. Start with README.md for project overview
2. Review CONTEXT.md to understand the "why"
3. Consult GLOSSARY.md for terminology
4. Follow CONTRIBUTING.md for contributions
5. Reference specific docs as needed
6. All docs follow consistent format and cross-reference
7. Documentation maintained by respective teams
8. Review cycle: quarterly or with major features

Total Documentation Files: 59 markdown files + extensive docs/ folder
